content: Anyone got tips for when a client struggles to place/arrange images using CKEditor? I know ideally you don't design a page with text and images from within CKEditor (but rather use dedicated image fields, etc.), but when the client wants to add an image or two into the content body, how do you explain to them how to do that nicely? It's really not intuitive when dragging an image around and resizing it with the handles...
Would a frontend JS framework be able to handle these types of things better?
